name: Stuck Trigger
description:
Did you ever fly through the sky like a rocket, propulsed by only the recoil of your gun? Well, now you can! And on your journey, we would appreciate it if you could take out some bad guys. 

Ohh, and don't shoot the good guys! You know the gist, we don't want to fill out another casualty report paper...

Anyways, beware of the acid pools and have fun!

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK-Jam-2020.

Controls:

  • Click once to start shooting
  • Aim with mouse
  • F for fullscreen

Game and assets made by Janis Bögershausen

Check out my twitter here: https://twitter.com/ZailDev
